## The Webbed Hollow Celestial Jade Lotus Pill
The Webbed Hollow Celestial Jade Lotus Pill
img_below_text:
The Celestial Jade Lotus Pill of Chapter 4 can be found just opposite the giant hole leading down into the Webbed Hollow from the Estate of Zhu. It's sitting on a table in front of a large stone circle.

img_summary: The image depicts a mystical setting within a game environment, featuring a character standing before a large stone circle adorned with intricate designs. The scene is dimly lit, with candles and cobwebs adding to the eerie atmosphere. This location is significant as it is where the Celestial Jade Lotus Pill of Chapter 4 can be found, situated on a table in front of the stone circle. The image serves to illustrate the specific in-game location where players can discover this item, which is opposite the giant hole leading into the Webbed Hollow from the Estate of Zhu.
